greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of the n-th powers of the distinct prime divisors of n.
example: a(6) = 793 because the distinct prime divisors of 6 are 2 and 3, and 2^6 + 3^6 = 793.
results.author: _Michel Lagneau_, Nov 22 2011
